snippet.title: Hallowed Encounter Trailer - Indie Horror Game | Halloween 2017
snippet.description: Trick-or-Treat! Or so you thought? Halloween night, last year, Weston Norris mourned the loss of his daughter. This year he plans on hiding in his apartment to avoid any reminder of this horrible day. In order to keep up his persona as one of the town’s popular CEO’s, he must ensure no one knows he’s avoiding the innocent trick-or-treaters. But, once you sit alone in the screamingly silent darkness on Halloween night, you’ll truly learn what goes bump in the night.
